description: Tony ... You may remember Tony from our very popular video release, Soldier Slumber Party, where he and Dean get right down comfortable with spending the night together. Later they bring in Kody for a second scene as well. But our members to the website will always remember Tony as the hero that saved the day at our LIVE Christmas party on Active Duty LIVE and got ol' Tarzan to cross the line. Tony set his eyes on Tarzan's cock and didn't give up until he had the monster in his mouth by the end of the night. We will always hold him in high esteem around here for that achievement. Now, in our Troop Review of Tony you get him all alone and uncensored. Cole filmed this scene (which was Tony's first time on camera) and later told me that he was sure Tony was trying to come on to him during the shoot. Take a look, troops, and see if you agree with Cole.
title: Tony
